summary: This document is an email from March 10, 2020, discussing the travel agency Shoppers Travel and its connection to Jeffrey Epstein. It references a payment from Epstein to Seth Rosenberg in June 2006 and includes a summary of travel records from 1999-2009. The email also mentions Darren Indyke facilitating contact with Rosenberg and suggests the agency did travel for Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Seth Rosenberg
persons.context: Mentioned as a contact for Shoppers Travel, received a $6,000 payment from Jeffrey Epstein in June 2006.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Reportedly put the email sender in touch with Seth Rosenberg.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Made a $6,000 payment to Seth Rosenberg in June 2006, and is the subject of the travel records being discussed.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Believed to have used Shoppers Travel for her travel arrangements, possibly through an assistant.

connections.description: Epstein made a $6,000 payment to Rosenberg in June 2006, related to travel services.
Indyke facilitated contact between the email sender and Rosenberg.
The travel agency is believed to have handled travel for Maxwell, possibly through an assistant.
Both are mentioned as clients of the same travel agency, Shoppers Travel.

events.title: $6,000 Payment from Epstein to Rosenberg
events.description: A payment of $6,000 was made from Jeffrey Epstein to Seth Rosenberg.

events.title: Start of Travel Records
events.description: The summary of travel records from Shoppers Travel begins.

events.title: End of Main Travel Record Period
events.description: The primary set of travel records from Shoppers Travel runs through this date.

keyFacts: The travel agency Shoppers Travel handled arrangements for Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell from at least 1999 to 2006.
A $6,000 payment was made from Jeffrey Epstein to Seth Rosenberg in June 2006.
Attorney Darren Indyke facilitated contact with Seth Rosenberg.
A 19-page summary of travel records exists, covering January 4, 1999, through December 13, 2006, with some additional records from 2007-2009.
